English: You can recenter you view and your controllers \nby pressing Home button.
Chinese: 按下任意一个Home键,\n可以重置头显和控制器的角度.

English: Hold both of your controllers in front of you and point them toward tracking camera. \nYou can recenter your view by pressing Home button on both controllers
Chinese: 双手平举控制器面向摄像头,同时按下\n双手Home键,可重置摄像头角度.

English: The game will start once you move and\n align you controllers into the same colored area.
Chinese: 请把两个控制器移动到对应颜色的区域内,\n即可开始游戏.

English: To get started,aim controllers forward \nand press both Home buttons
Chinese: 请把双手的控制器指向前方,并同时\n按下两个Home键,即可开始游戏.

English: To get started,You have reset the tracker's location
Chinese: 你已经重置外部跟踪摄像头的位置
